sentences.en: Angry, and half in love with her, and tremendously sorry, I turned away.
sentences.cn: 我又气又恼,对她有几分依恋, 同时心里又非常难过, 只好转身走开了.

sentences.en: Both Hal and I were tremendously excited about the possibility.
sentences.cn: 我和哈尔都对这一可能性感到极其兴奋.

sentences.en: He was tremendously interested in his profession.
sentences.cn: 他对自己的职业有特别的兴趣.

sentences.en: He was tremendously proud of Jack.
sentences.cn: 他为杰克感到非常自豪.

sentences.en: I found the scene in which Percy proposed to Olive tremendously poignant.
sentences.cn: 我觉得珀西向奥利芙求婚的一幕太让人心酸了。

sentences.en: I thought they played tremendously well, didn't you?
sentences.cn: 我认为他们踢得非常棒，你不觉得吗？

sentences.en: It'seems she was tremendously admired there.
sentences.cn: 好像那时候她就已经出人头地了.

sentences.en: Roy was tremendously ugly, mega ugly.
The experience has been tremendously educational.
sentences.cn: 这一经历极富教育意义.

sentences.en: The sciences of planetary geology have benefited tremendously from these new finds.
sentences.cn: 行星地质科学从这些新发现中受益匪浅.

sentences.en: The spectacle of Xerxes's defeat tremendously reinforced the traditional conviction that pride goes before a fall.
sentences.cn: 泽克西斯战败的景象极其使人信服“骄兵必败 ” 这句源远流长的老话.

sentences.en: They shout and gesticulate tremendously but cannot agree.
sentences.cn: 他俩指手划脚,大吵大闹,相持不下.

sentences.en: University funding was tremendously biased towards scientists.
sentences.cn: 大学科研经费向科学家极大地倾斜。

trans.tran_cn: 极大地，极端地，极其，非常
